titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore Advisory Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-472.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 890.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 5/26/1988--Introduced. Reauthorizes the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore Advisory Commission for an additional ten years. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to consult with the Commission with respect to specified aspects of development of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan.
